Package com.vaadin.contrib.gwtgraphics.client

Interface Summary
Positionable A class implementing this interface can be positioned by setting the x and y coordinates.
Strokeable This interface must be implemented by VectorObjects that can be stroked.
VectorObjectContainer Classes implementing this class are able to contain VectorObjects.
 

Class Summary
DrawingArea The following example shows how a DrawingArea instance is created and added to a GWT application.
Group Group is a container, which can contain one or more VectorObjects.
Image Image represents a raster image that can be embedded into DrawingArea.
Line Line represents a straight line from one point to another.
Shape Shape is an abstract upper-class for VectorObjects that support filling, stroking and positioning.
VectorObject An abstract base class for drawing objects the DrawingArea can contain.
